author: Albert Einstein
quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.

author: Maya Angelou
quote: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: Creativity is just connecting things.

author: Pablo Picasso
quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.

author: T.S. Eliot
quote: Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity.

author: Salvador Dalí
quote: Have no fear of perfection — you’ll never reach it.

author: Elizabeth Gilbert
quote: A creative life is an amplified life.

author: Leo Burnett
quote: Curiosity about life in all of its aspects, I think, is still the secret of great creative people.

author: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.

author: Vincent Van Gogh
quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.

author: Twyla Tharp
quote: Creativity is a habit, and the best creativity is the result of good work habits.

author: George Lois
quote: Creativity can solve almost any problem. The creative act, the defeat of habit by originality, overcomes everything.

author: Linus Pauling
quote: The best way to have a good idea is to have a lot of ideas.

author: Ray Bradbury
quote: You can’t try to do things; you simply must do them.

author: Kurt Vonnegut
quote: To practice any art, no matter how well or badly, is a way to make your soul grow. So do it.

author: Edward de Bono
quote: Creativity involves breaking out of established patterns in order to look at things in a different way.

author: John Cleese
quote: Creativity is not a talent, it is a way of operating.

author: Neil Gaiman
quote: The world always seems brighter when you’ve just made something that wasn’t there before.

author: George Bernard Shaw
quote: Imagination is the beginning of creation.

author: Charles Mingus
quote: Creativity is more than just being different. Anybody can be different making the simple, awesomely simple, that’s creativity.
